problem_names: lemma "myss3 x y a z v"
translations: text \<open> We can instantiate one of the statespaces with a concrete alphabet type as shown below. \<close>

alphabet myss_c =
  x :: int
  y :: int
  a :: string
  z :: string
  v :: string
lemma "myss3 x y a z v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. myss3 x y a z v
by (simp add: myss'_def myss2_axioms_def myss2_def myss3.intro myss3_axioms.intro myss_def)
